Member Function Documentation

◆ getMapToWorldTransform()

const bool SimulationTfPublisher::getMapToWorldTransform ( const std::string &  entity_name,
const tf::Transform &  base_footprint_to_world_tf,
tf::Transform &  map_to_world_tf 
)
private

Compute the transform between the map tranform of a Gazebo model and the world model from the Gazebo message.

Parameters
entity_nameName of the model in Gazebo and the tf frames. Used to listen to the tf frames.
base_footprint_to_world_tfTransform of the absolute and correct position between the model and the world.
map_to_world_tfReturned value of the transform between the map of the entity and the world.
Return values
falseError, could not lookup the transform of the entity.
trueOK
